historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For Law 14-114, see notes following § 42-3171.01.

DC CODE § 42-3173.11

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: Amounts collected by the District of Columbia under this subchapter shall be deposited into the fund established by § 42-3131.01(b)(1).
Amounts in the fund established by § 42-3131.01(b)(1), may be used to pay the costs incurred by the District to demolish or enclose a structure under this subchapter.

chapter.text: Quick Acquisition of Abandoned and Nuisance Property.

heading.catch_text: Use of funds; deposit of funds.
